verses.text: 神在風暴中顯示能力威嚴 （大衛的詩。） 神的眾子啊！要歸給耶和華，你們要把榮耀和能力歸給耶和華。（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）

words.note: Refers to the one true God.
Used as a locative suffix.
Refers to the one true God.
In this context, refers to angelic or divine beings.
Refers to the traditional Hebrew text of the Jewish Bible.
Refers to marginal notes or specific markings in biblical texts.

verses.text: 要把耶和華的名的榮耀歸給他，要以聖潔的裝束敬拜耶和華（「要以聖潔的裝束敬拜耶和華」或譯：「在耶和華顯現的時候，要敬拜他」，或「要在耶和華聖潔的光輝中敬拜他」）。

words.note: Refers to priestly or sacred garments.
Refers to priestly or sacred garments.
Used as a locative suffix.

verses.text: 耶和華的聲音在眾水之上，榮耀的 神打雷，耶和華打雷在大水之上。

words.note: Functions as an adjective modifying 'God'.
Refers to the one true God.

verses.text: 耶和華的聲音大有能力，耶和華的聲音充滿威嚴。

words.note: Literally 'greatly has'.

verses.text: 耶和華的聲音震斷了香柏樹，耶和華震斷了黎巴嫩的香柏樹。
他使黎巴嫩山跳躍像牛犢，使西連山跳躍像野牛犢。

words.note: Specifically a young ox/calf, often used in biblical animal imagery.
Lit. 'wild ox calf', refers to a young wild ox.

verses.text: 耶和華的聲音帶著火燄劈下。
耶和華的聲音震撼曠野，耶和華震撼加低斯的曠野。

words.note: Common in biblical contexts for desert regions.
Common in biblical contexts for desert regions.

verses.text: 耶和華的聲音驚動母鹿生產，使林中的樹木光禿凋零；凡是在他殿中的都說：「榮耀啊！」

words.note: Often used to describe leaves or flowers withering and falling.
Refers to a grand hall or temple, like God's temple.
Often used in a spiritual or divine sense.

verses.text: 耶和華坐在洪水之上，耶和華坐著為王直到永遠。

words.note: Can refer to 'the Flood' or simply large waters.
Classical Chinese particle, often used for 'of' or 'possessive' in formal contexts.

verses.text: 願耶和華賜力量給他的子民，願耶和華賜平安的福給他的子民。

words.note: The Hebrew name for God.
Often used for bestowals from a superior.
Refers to the chosen people of God.
The Hebrew name for God.
Often used for bestowals from a superior.
Refers to the chosen people of God.
